resources.string: Version 1 of Main Page, by Jacob Danby
Click One of the Three Buttons to Enter an Activity
Welcome to Mobile Final Project: Nutrition Database
Select One of the Buttons Below to Change Activities

This is the Mobile Final Project by Jacob Danby, Jaddua Jones, and Erick Menjivar. We chose the Nutrition Database for our project topic. The buttons below lead to every function we have created for the application, please enjoy and click out of this dialogue box to continue your use of the application.
Type Your Name Here and it will Save and Welcome You
